Generated Narrative: ValueSet mcode-rhabdomyosarcoma-clinical-group-value-vs

This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include codes fromhttp://snomed.info/sct where concept descends from 405917009 (Intergroup rhabdomyosarcoma study post-surgical clinical group finding (finding))
  • Include these codes as defined in http://ncicb.nci.nih.gov/xml/owl/EVS/Thesaurus.owl
    CodeDisplay
    C148012Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Group I
    C148015Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Group II
    C148019Intergroup Rhabdomyosarcoma Group III

name: RhabdomyosarcomaClinicalGroupValueVS
title: Rhabdomyosarcoma Clinical Group Value
description: Intergroup code indicating whether the rhabdomyosarcoma is confined to its primary location or has extended beyond the site of origin.
